;BIRTH OF THE PEDESTRIAN REVOLUTION MOD
;Last update	2023-february-13
;
;--- BASE NETWORK CROSSWALKS ---
;--- CLASSIC PEDMALL 01 - SIDEWALK PAVEMENT ---
;
;-- ROAD & BIDIRECTIONAL SINGLE TILE NWM --
;-- ROAD (RD-2) NETWORK --
;3-way OXO road thru & end street T intersection - initial override
0x5C531100,0,0,0x00AA0800,1,0=0x5C531100,0,0,0x5C541000,0,0
0x5C531100,1,0,0x00AA0800,1,0=0x5C531100,1,0,0x5C541000,0,0
0x5C531100,2,0,0x00AA0800,1,0=0x5C531100,2,0,0x5C541000,0,0
0x5C531100,3,0,0x00AA0800,1,0=0x5C531100,3,0,0x5C541000,0,0
;4-way OXO + intersection - initial override
0x5C531100,0,0,0x00AA0A00,1,0=0x5C531100,0,0,0x5C541000,0,0
0x5C531100,1,0,0x00AA0A00,1,0=0x5C531100,1,0,0x5C541000,0,0
0x5C531100,2,0,0x00AA0A00,1,0=0x5C531100,2,0,0x5C541000,0,0

0x5C531100,0,0,0x00AA0A00,3,0=0x5C531100,0,0,0x5C541000,0,0
0x5C531100,1,0,0x00AA0A00,3,0=0x5C531100,1,0,0x5C541000,0,0
0x5C531100,2,0,0x00AA0A00,3,0=0x5C531100,2,0,0x5C541000,0,0
0x5C531100,3,0,0x00AA0A00,3,0=0x5C531100,3,0,0x5C541000,0,0
;4-way OXO + intersection - continuity
;Through Segment
0x5C541000,0,0,0x05004B00,1,0=0x5C541000,0,0,0x5C531100,1,0
0x5C541000,0,0,0x05004B00,3,0=0x5C541000,0,0,0x5C531100,3,0

;End Stub
